kilo: Crew loading an opertional 53 - 65 KE torpedo into the launch tube of a Kilo class submarine.
组员装填53-65KE训练鱼雷进入“基洛”(Kilo)级潜艇的发射管之内.
China has bought 12 Russian Kilo - class diesel attack submarines.
中国购买了12艘俄罗斯基洛级(Kilo-class)柴油攻击潜艇.
The work kilo is often used as a prefix.
An abbreviation for the prefix kilo , that is, 1000 in decimal notation.
前缀kilo(千)的缩写, 即十进制数的1000.
Crew loading a 53 - 65 KE training torpedo into the tube of a Kilo class submarine.
组员装填一枚操作型53-65KE鱼雷进入“基洛”(Kilo)级潜艇的发射管之内.
